description: D & R’s truck is bringing amazing Bar-B-Que to the foodies of the whole Hays County area. You’re encouraged to come out and start your day the tasty way by building your own breakfast taco or bowl- with your choice of proteins (including D & R’s famous brisket, eggs, sausage, etc...) and veggies (including crisp potatoes, mushrooms, avocados, Serrano peppers, and more). Later in the day, come back and dig into their delicious selection of sandwiches, salads, and wraps, all packed with your choice of tender chopped beef brisket, sliced brisket, or juicy chicken. For all this and much more, come try the fare that the Lone Star state is most famous for, courtesy of the ever-talented team at D & R’s Bar-B-Que.
name: D & R's Bar-B-Que
